label: specifiedSubordinateLineTradeSettlement
comment: A trade settlement specified for this subordinate trade line item.

rangeIncludes.comment: The information, at a subordinate line level, that enables the reconciliation of a financial transaction with the item(s) that the financial transaction is intended to settle, for example a commercial invoice.

domainIncludes.comment: A collection of information specific to a subordinate item being used or reported on for trade purposes.
